title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the megalopolis of Night City, where you play as V, a mercenary outlaw going after a one-of-a-kind implant that is the key to immortality.

title: Elden Ring
description: A fantasy action-RPG adventure set within a world created by Hidetaka Miyazaki and George R. R. Martin. Journey through the Lands Between to become the Elden Lord.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: A story-driven, open world adventure set in a dark fantasy universe where you play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter tasked with finding a child of prophecy.

title: Baldur's Gate 3
description: A next-generation RPG set in the world of Dungeons & Dragons where your choices shape a tale of fellowship and betrayal, survival and sacrifice.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An epic tale of life in America's unforgiving heartland. The game's vast and atmospheric world provides the foundation for an entirely new kind of open world experience.

title: Starfield
description: A next-generation role-playing game set amongst the stars. Create any character you want and explore with unparalleled freedom in this epic journey to answer humanity's greatest mystery.

title: Call of Duty: Warzone
description: A free-to-play combat arena with two main modes: Battle Royale and Plunder. Features cross-platform play and massive 150-player battles.

title: Minecraft
description: A sandbox adventure game where players explore infinite worlds and build everything from simple homes to grand castles. Create, explore, and survive in this block-based universe.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: An action-adventure game set in the fictional state of San Andreas, following three criminals and their efforts to commit heists while under pressure from a government agency.

title: Counter-Strike 2
description: The largest technical leap forward in Counter-Strike's history, featuring modern rendering, tick-rate-independent gameplay, and upgraded community workshop tools.

title: Fallout 4
description: A post-apocalyptic action RPG where you emerge from Vault 211 into a devastated world, searching for your missing son in the Commonwealth wasteland.

title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
description: An epic fantasy RPG where you play as the Dragonborn, a hero born with the power of The Voice, destined to save the world from the dragon Alduin.

title: DOOM Eternal
description: The ultimate combination of speed and power as you battle against demonic forces from hell in this first-person shooter with brutal combat.

title: Portal 2
description: A puzzle-platform game that challenges you with solving spatial puzzles using a portal gun while navigating the dilapidated Aperture Science Enrichment Center.

title: Resident Evil 4
description: A survival horror game where special agent Leon S. Kennedy is sent on a mission to rescue the U.S. President's daughter from a mysterious cult in rural Europe.

title: God of War
description: A single-player action-adventure game that follows Kratos and his son Atreus on a mythic journey through the realm of Midgard in Norse mythology.

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: Lead epic Viking raids against Saxon armies and fortresses as you build your clan's new settlement in 9th century England.

title: Dota 2
description: A competitive MOBA game where two teams of five players battle to destroy the enemy's Ancient structure while defending their own.

title: Overwatch 2
description: A team-based first-person shooter featuring intense 5v5 battles with a diverse cast of heroes in futuristic locations around the world.

title: Fortnite
description: A free-to-play battle royale game where 100 players fight to be the last one standing while building structures and using various weapons.

title: League of Legends
description: A fast-paced competitive MOBA game where two teams of powerful champions battle to destroy the enemy's Nexus on the Fields of Justice.

title: Apex Legends
description: A free-to-play battle royale game where legendary characters with powerful abilities team up to fight for fame and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier.

title: Destiny 2
description: A free-to-play online-only multiplayer first-person shooter set in a mythic science fiction world with various player versus environment and player versus player modes.

title: Borderlands 3
description: A loot-driven first-person shooter where you play as one of four new Vault Hunters on a mission to defeat the Calypso Twins and save the galaxy.

title: Halo Infinite
description: The next evolution of Halo combat where the Master Chief returns to confront his greatest challenge yet and save humanity from impending doom.

title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: An action-adventure game set in feudal Japan where you play as a disgraced and disfigured warrior on a quest to rescue his master and take revenge.

title: Divinity: Original Sin 2
description: A single-player and multiplayer fantasy RPG with turn-based combat, deep character customization, and a richly interactive world where your choices matter.

title: Warframe
description: A free-to-play cooperative third-person shooter where you play as a Tenno, an ancient warrior who must battle against various factions in the solar system.
